---
name: No manual issues in this repo
about: Issues should be opened in the main JOSS repo
title: ''
labels: ''
assignees: ''

---

ğŸš¨ğŸš¨ğŸš¨ **Do not open issues here** ğŸš¨ğŸš¨ğŸš¨

Issues in this repository are generated by the journal submission system following commands by JOSS editors.

If you have a question about JOSS then please open an issue on the main JOSS repository: https://github.com/openjournals/joss

If you're concerned that your submission has not been received, it almost certainly has,
and an associate editor-in-chief will create the pre-review issue in due course.
Please do *not* open an issue in the main JOSS repository until at least four weeks have passed.
